titleStmt.title: An epytaphe, of the godlye constau[n]t, [and] counfortable co[n]fessor mystres (Darothye [sic] Wynnes) whiche slepte in Christ the yere of grace. M.D.LX. Made by, Frances Newport
titleStmt.author: Newport, Frances.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Owen Rogers dwelling betwene both Saynt Bartelmews, at the Spread Eagle,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 10386 (fragment of 18499) on UMI microfilm reel 1545 and as STC 18500 on reel 1550.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library.
